fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, isolate an island. For the rest of the day, they cannot interact or be interacted with anyone except for other people on their island. “Interact” includes whispers, votes, and day abilities.
- During the day, sink an island. All of them will be unable to perform their night abilities, and all visits against them will fail. (Costs 3 Gold + 1 for each player on the island.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, the host will create a circular map of the town. Anyone who is visited by any number of players  is considered “land” and anyone who isn’t visited is considered “water” on this map. You will see this map at the end of the night.
- An "island" is a group of land bound by water on both sides.
- You may only perform one ability each day.
- Your visit does not count towards the land/water distribution (e.g. if no one else visits your target, they are still considered water.)
- If you perform the Factional Kill and your target would be considered “water,” your attack is Powerful.
- Detection immune

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were plundered by an Indonesian Jong.” (Factional Kill)
“Your island was isolated!” (Isolated island)
“Your island was sunk! You cannot act.” (Sunken island)
